pointsTarget.title: Points Target
pointsTarget.content: The amount of points you need to score to proceed to the next level

playableHand.title: Playable Hand
playableHand.content: This is your hand. Click on cards to preselect them and form a poker hand

playCards.title: Play Cards
playCards.content: Whenever you are ready you can play your preselected cards

pointsMultiplier.title: Points and Multiplier
pointsMultiplier.content: Each poker hand has base points and a multiplier that will contribute to your final score

coins.title: Coins
coins.content: Congratulations! After defeating a level, you earn coins to spend in the store.

levelUpHands.title: Level Up Your Hands
levelUpHands.content: You can upgrade your hands. The higher the level of your poker hands, the more points and multi they score

buyPacks.title: Buy Packs
buyPacks.content: Here you can get packs to boost your deck. These packs offer a chance to obtain rare and special cards at a lower cost.

buyCards.title: Buy Traditional and Neon Cards
buyCards.content: Here you can buy traditional and neon cards to enhance your deck. Neon cards score double points and +1 multi.

modifiers.title: Modifiers
modifiers.content: Modifiers are cards that are added to your deck and apply effects to your traditional cards, like adding more points or changing the suit

specialCards.title: Special Cards
specialCards.content: Special cards grant unique global powers and get active immediately. These can turn the tide of the game!

rerollStore.title: Reroll the Store
rerollStore.content: Not finding what you need? Spend some coins to reroll the store and see a fresh set of cards and hands to upgrade.

nextLevel.title: Proceed to the Next Level
nextLevel.content: Ready to continue? Click here to advance to the next level and face new challenges!

specialCards.title: Special Cards
specialCards.content: Special cards activate immediately after you purchase them in the store. They apply their effects after your hand is played.

discardingCards.title: Discarding special cards
discardingCards.content: If you don’t want to use a special card, you can discard it at any time by clicking the discard button that will pop up over the card.
discardingCards.content-mobile: If you don’t want to use a special card, you can discard it at any time by dragging it to the discard button.

modifierCard.title: Modifier Card
modifierCard.content: Modifier cards enhance or alter a specific card. Drag and drop a modifier onto a preselected card to activate its effect.

discard.title: Discard
discard.content: Click the discard button that will pop up over the card to discard it without losing any discard chances.
discard.content-mobile: Drag the modifier and drop it onto the discard button to discard it without losing any discard chances.
